about.title: About Me
about.intro: Iâ€™m Sajad, 38 years old, a frontend developer passionate about React and Next.js.
about.details: In the past, I worked in various fields including financial markets and fire alarm & extinguishing systems in the oil and gas industry. But none of those paths made me feel fulfilled. In 2024, I decided to follow my true passion: programming. I joined a 7-month bootcamp focused on React and Next.js, and successfully completed it. Now, I'm eager to pursue my path as a developer and keep growing every day.
